register.description: Diagnostic Register Control

bitfield.description: Diagnostic Rd Wr access to Embedded RAM Selector Mux. This bit controls the mux select or which RAM and which section of that RAM are assessed via the VBUSP read of RAM. (This MMR is not shadowed)

register.description: All modes are set here

bitfield.description: enable Lens Shading Correction Compensation. When disabled, implments a unity gain
bit per BAYER color component indicating which of two sets of 16 segment PWL Curve to use for LSCC. 0: use set0 1: use set1
single bit controlling T_n calculation 0: use u_mode bits to indicate which LL2 to average and which bits to keep independent without averaging 1: independent no averaging

bit per BAYER color component indicating Decomp sub component 0: average with others 1: independent color component do not average for calculation of U Suppress. bit[0]:color 0 at (v=0, h=0) bit[1]:color 1 at (v=0, h=1) bit[2]:color 2 at (v=1, h=0) bit[3]:color 3 at (v=1, h=1)

register.description: Input Output Frame dimensions in units of pixels. Same value for input and output

bitfield.description: (U13) input height in units of pixels minus 1.
(U13) input width in units of pixels minus 1. Max usable value determined by populated line buffer RAM size

register.description: Lens Shading Correction Compensation. First control register

bitfield.description: (U4.5) LSCC maximum gain. Any calculated value is clipped to this max value
(U4) LSCC radius dynamic range select. T is the right shift amount prior to MSB clip.
(U2.6) LSCC horizontal or Y Gain for elliptical lens
(U2.6) LSCC vertical or X Gain for elliptical lens

register.description: Lens Shading Correction Compensation. Programmable Center of frame

bitfield.description: (S14) Vertical (Y) position of lens center. Negative value supports the case where processed frame starts after the center. HW supports center config with below constraint. if (Y_cfg < 0) # negative DIM.ih_cfg + abs(Y_cfg) < 8K else # positive Y_cfg < 8K

(S14) Horizontal (X) position of lens center. Negative value supports the case where processed frame starts after the center. HW supports center config with below constraint. if (X_cfg < 0) # negative DIM.iw_cfg + abs(X_cfg) < 8K else # positive X_cfg < 8K

register.description: Tn scaling factor multiplied by all 4 color components Tn after 12 segment PWL. Different scaling factor per level

bitfield.description: (U3.5) Level3. Sub-bands 7, 8, 9
(U3.5) Level2. Sub-bands 4, 5, 6
(U3.5) Level1. Sub-bands 0, 1, 2

register.description: U suppression curve knee. Same knee value for all 9 levels x 4 color components.

bitfield.description: (U0.6) U Suppress curve knee. X (LL2) value which separates constant suppression of 1.0 from linear suppression.

register.description: White Balance Gain (Part0). Separate Gain for each of 4 colors

bitfield.description: (U4.9) Gain for color 1
(U4.9) Gain for color 0

register.description: White Balance Gain (Part1). Separate Gain for each of 4 colors

bitfield.description: (U4.9) Gain for color 3
(U4.9) Gain for color 2

register.description: Dynamic White Balance Control Register

bitfield.description: Dynamic White Balance Enable

register.description: Has control parameters related to Raw Domain Histogram

bitfield.description: Enable for ROIs. Each bit corresponds to one ROI. bit[x] to ROI[x]. Use lower index regions if less than 8 regions are needed.
BitWidth of the input image, values greater than 16 will be treated as 16 and values less than 12 will be treated as 12
0->Use shift(bitwidth-12), 1->Use LUT
Bank attached to Histogram HW Datapath. Shadowed and internal control is updated outisde of active frame 0 -> HW access Bank0 & Cfg MMR access Bank1 1 -> HW access Bank1 & Cfg MMR access Bank0.

Histogram Phase select enable; one bit for each color channel. Up to 2 bits can be enabled; only bit can be enabled per line. bit[0]:color 0 at (v=0, h=0) bit[1]:color 1 at (v=0, h=1) bit[2]:color 2 at (v=1, h=0) bit[3]:color 3 at (v=1, h=1)
Raw domain Histogram Enable. When enbaled minimum frame width has to be 128

register.description: Weights to calculate intensity

bitfield.description: U9Q8 Weight1
U9Q8 Weight0

register.description: Weights to calculate intensity

bitfield.description: U9Q8 Weight3
U9Q8 Weight2

register.description: Weights to calculate intensity

bitfield.description: U9Q8 Weight5
U9Q8 Weight4

register.description: Start Pixel location for the region

bitfield.description: Valid line start Vertically. Needs to be even. Minimum is 2 and should be greater than previous region EndY
Valid pixel start Horizontally. Has to be even

register.description: End Pixel location for the region

bitfield.description: Valid line end Vertically. Min region height is 8 and region height has to be even
Valid pixel end Horizontally. Min region width is 8 and region width has to be even

register.description: T_n 12 segment piecewise linear curve Part0 (4 color x 12 segment)

bitfield.description: (U15) Y (U) value. T_n resulting value from lookup. Starting point from which SLOPE will linearly calculate between X Y points
(U16) X (LL2) value. LL2 averaged input value into lookup rounded down to nearest X value. (X0 programmed value is unused and defaults to a value of 0 in hardware implementation)

register.description: T_n 12 segment piecewise linear curve Part1 (4 color x 12 segment)

bitfield.description: (S5.11) S value. Slope value used calculated linear interpolation between X Y points

register.description: LSCC 16 segment piecewise linear curve Part0 (2 set x 16 segment)

bitfield.description: (U15.0) Y (U) value. LSCC Gain resulting value from lookup. Starting point from which SLOPE will linearly calculate between X Y points
(U16) X (normalized radius from center) value. Input rounded down to nearest X value. (X0 programmed value is unused and defaults to a value of 0 in hardware implementation)

register.description: LSCC 16 segment piecewise linear curve Part1 (2 set x 16 segment)

bitfield.description: (S5.11) S value. Slope value used calculated linear interpolation between X Y points

register.description: Dynamic WB 8 segment piecewise linear curve Part0. 4 color x 8 segment

bitfield.description: U12Q8 Y Reference value from the segment. Starting point from which SLOPE will linearly calculate between X Y points
U16 X Intesity value. X0 programmed value is unused and defaults to a value of 0 in hardware implementation

register.description: Dynamic WB 8 segment piecewise linear curve Part1 (4 color x 8 segment)

bitfield.description: S16Q12 Slope value for the segment. Slope value used calculated linear interpolation between X Y points
